name: StarCraft: Brood War
description:
StarCraft: Brood War is a game developed by Saffire. It was originally released in 1998. It was published by Blizzard Entertainment. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
StarCraft: Brood War is available on PC and macOS.
It was produced by Shane Dabiri. Glenn Stafford, Jason Hayes and Tracy W. Bush scored the game.
